info.title: Supplier Evaluation Operational Score - Read
info.description: This service enables consumers to read operational supplier evaluation scores from the SAP S/4HANA Cloud system. These scores are calculated in the SAP S/4HANA Cloud system by time, by quantity, by price, and by quality. This service is based on the OData protocol, and can be consumed by apps and other interfaces.

x-sap-shortText: Read operational supplier evaluation scores from the SAP S/4HANA Cloud system using this inbound service

values.text: Procurement - Operational Supplier Evaluation Score Integration(SAP_COM_0324)
[Supplier Evaluation and Performance Monitoring(SL4)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/SL4 " Link To BP ")

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http

GET SAP__Currencies HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

--response-separator

{...}
--response-separator--
